flawed_nl_solution:
In four years, Hans will be 8+4=<<8+4=12>>12 years old.
Then Annika will be 12*3=<<12*3=36>>36 years old.
So Annika right now is 36-4=<<36-4=23>>23 years old.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
